name: ノイズ
message: "But this really isn't the time or the place for flirting."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Flirting? Come on. Oh, did you manage to pull off that hack?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Yeah. They shouldn't have gotten any alerts from those Allmates."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Good. I guess we should get going while we... ow."

A spike of pain in my side makes me wince. I'd forgotten it while we were arguing, but now the pain comes rushing back.

The wound throbs, almost like my heart has taken up residence in the spot.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Owowow..."

name: ノイズ
message: "Is it the burn?"
Noiz stands up and takes a look at the wound.

name: ノイズ
message: "Must really hurt."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: ノイズ
message: "Guess we better treat it or something."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Uh, yeah, I mean, if we can."
I look up at Noiz, astonished, while I answer.
He's... concerned about me?

name: ノイズ
message: "What?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Nothing."

name: ノイズ
message: "Let's see..."
Noiz starts rummaging through his pockets.
After a moment, he pulls out... a white handkerchief.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You carry a handkerchief around?"

name: ノイズ
message: "...Old habit, okay?"
Noiz shoots me a glare.
Right. Noiz comes from a rich family, so he had a pretty high-class upbringing.
But still, a white handkerchief...
That's kinda cute.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh-huh."

name: ノイズ
message: "Fuck off."
He grumpily shoves the handkerchief back into his pocket.

name: ノイズ
message: "I don't have anything we can use."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's okay. I can handle it."
I stand, fighting the pain, and try to walk.
But...

name: ノイズ
message: "Does it hurt?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "A little..."

name: ノイズ
message: "I'll go look for something."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But there might be more of those things."

name: ノイズ
message: "I'll manage. Wait here. And take this. If anything happens, press the eye."
Noiz pulls one of the cubes from his waist and tosses it to me.
Just as he gets to the door, he looks back.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"
He suddenly reaches out and pulls my head toward him... and then, our lips touch.
And he licks me.

name: ノイズ
message: "See ya."
With that, Noiz leaves the room. His expression never changes.
After he's gone, I let out a bashful sigh.
Sometimes it feels like I'm letting him lead me around by the nose...
...Not that I really mind.
I sit back down on the floor, shielding my wounded flank as I lean against a shelf.
I hope Noiz is okay.
We're smack in the middle of enemy territory. I don't care how strong he is, I'm still worried about him.
My burn stings, almost as if it were resonating with my fears.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You better come back soon."
I squeeze the cube tight, praying for his safe return.
